trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZB103_05043_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Vyurvarjur has just filled his vials with wardingwater.
TEXT_KINGZB103_05043_TODO_00<tab>Search the designated areas, weaken any elder flints that appear, and sprinkle them with wardingwater.
TEXT_KINGZB103_05043_VYURVARJUR_000_000<tab>You there! By my reckoning, you look to be precisely the sort of seasoned warrior we need right now.
TEXT_KINGZB103_05043_VYURVARJUR_000_001<tab>Not far from these ruins, there are craters where the heat of Valigarmanda's scorching devastation yet lingers, attracting swarms of elder flints.

TEXT_KINGZB103_05043_VYURVARJUR_100_001<tab>If left unchecked, these rock-like creatures will feed on the flames there until they explode. A gathering of flints could incite a chain reaction with greater potential for harm.

TEXT_KINGZB103_05043_VYURVARJUR_000_002<tab>Normally we stamp them out on sight, but they have begun to multiply faster than we can rout them, and we are regrettably shorthanded. Thus did I devise a means to impede their proliferation.
TEXT_KINGZB103_05043_VYURVARJUR_000_003<tab>Would you weaken the elder flints swarming the craters and sprinkle this wardingwater upon them? If it is not too much to ask, of course.
TEXT_KINGZB103_05043_VYURVARJUR_000_005<tab>We need but weaken the elder flints and sprinkle them with wardingwater. Would you take up that task on our behalf?
TEXT_KINGZB103_05043_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>You see no sign of any rock-like monsters.
TEXT_KINGZB103_05043_VYURVARJUR_000_010<tab>Forgive me─I thought I would observe your progress from a safe distance. But I see now that my plan was a success!

TEXT_KINGZB103_05043_VYURVARJUR_000_011<tab>You see, our wardingwater is collected from the sacred depths of Karvarhur the First. It has the power to greatly diminish fire energy stored within an elder flint.

TEXT_KINGZB103_05043_VYURVARJUR_000_012<tab>Subsequently, those imbued with water don't <var 1A 02 /var>explode<var 1A 01 /var> so much as fizzle out. In this way, only the comparatively less dangerous creatures will be allowed to multiply safely.

TEXT_KINGZB103_05043_VYURVARJUR_000_013<tab>So long as we continue our regular exterminations, we need no longer live in fear of large-scale explosions. Now, please accept a small payment for your assistance!
